noun.name: hair drier
noun.discription: a device used to dry and style hair

object1.name: leaf blower
object1.discription: in parallel with 'hair drier', is a device used to blow leaves and debris from surfaces

object2.name: vacuum cleaner
object2.discription: in parallel with 'hair drier', is a device used to remove dirt and dust from surfaces

object3.name: air compressor
object3.discription: in parallel with 'hair drier', is a device used to convert power into potential energy stored in pressurized air

object4.name: electric fan
object4.discription: in parallel with 'hair drier', is a device used to create a flow of air for cooling or ventilation

object5.name: pressure washer
object5.discription: in parallel with 'hair drier', is a device used to clean surfaces by using a high-pressure stream of water

object6.name: electric kettle
object6.discription: in parallel with 'hair drier', is a device used to boil water for beverages

object7.name: microwave oven
object7.discription: in parallel with 'hair drier', is a device used to cook or heat food by using microwave radiation

object8.name: electric toothbrush
object8.discription: in parallel with 'hair drier', is a device used to clean teeth by using electric power
